mailBody:
Dear J.P. Morgan Securities Team,

I hope this message finds you well.

As part of our ongoing compliance and risk assessment processes, we have updated our checklist for your organization and identified that we are still missing documentation regarding Politically Exposed Person (PEP) screenings for confirmed matches.

Could you please provide the necessary PEP documentation at your earliest convenience? This information is crucial for our records and to ensure continued compliance with regulatory requirements.

Thank you for your attention to this matter. We look forward to your prompt response.

Best regards,

[Your Name]  
[Your Position]  
[Your Company]  
[Your Contact Information]
